dcterms:description: RTP-LX consists of around 1,000 multilingual prompts either professionally translated from the English RTP dataset or hand-crafted to elicit culturally-specific toxic model continuations in a particular language.
dcterms:title: RTP-LX

dcterms:description: The English RTP Dataset is used to evaluate neural toxic degeneration in language models, providing a benchmark for toxicity classification.
dcterms:title: English RTP Dataset

dcterms:description: The Jigsaw Dataset is used for the Toxic Comment Classification Challenge, providing a benchmark for identifying toxic comments.

dcterms:description: Anthropic HH is a dataset used for training language models with reinforcement learning from human feedback, focusing on creating helpful and harmless AI.

dcterms:description: UltraFeedback is a dataset designed to boost language models with high-quality feedback, enhancing their performance.
